participant_1.name: Ethan Green
participant_1.personality: Adventurous, disciplined, and a bit of a perfectionist. Loves to explore new ideas and challenges.
participant_1.background: i only eat kosher. i read twenty books a year. i was raised in a single parent household. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i'm a stunt double as my second job.

participant_2.name: Sara Johnson
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful, caring, and passionate about healthy living. Enjoys sharing experiences and connecting with others.
participant_2.background: i'm married. i'm a vegetarian. my favorite color is blue. i am a woman.
